Who We Are

Les Soeurs Enterprise Corporation was founded in year 2016 by four sister who have passion in acquiring real estate assets and turning them into profitable spaces. Our common desire is to deliver a truly outstanding fit-out solution and to provide exceptional practices related to Property Management and Real Estate services.

Our Services

Design Consultancy

Providing incomparable designs, making sure your home or office is built with the high-quality materials available in the market that best suits your tastes and needs.

Procurement Services

Leave it to us to make sure that all materials, furniture, and appliances installed in your house have the best quality while the cost is affordable.

Move in Assistance

Save your energy with your family. We have a dedicated team to handle the leg work.
